name: Grim (Breaded Data)
description:
Description:
Grim is a short, top-down hack-and-slash action game where you play as Orpheus, one of the Reapers charged with harvesting wandering souls and shepherding them to the underworld where they belong! However, after being sent on what seemed to be a run-of-the-mill reaping an of a necromancer, Orpheus uncovers a revelation about his past self, and soon is drawn into a conspiracy that threatens the entire underworld itself!

NOTE: Plays much better with a controller, but is still fully playable with keyboard and mouse.

Credits:
Justin Camden - Design, 3D Art and Animation, Scriptwriting, Programming
Ryan Stevenson - Design, Programming, Scriptwriting, Original Game Concept
Dai Haraguchi and Emerson Hawthorne - Music and Misc Audio
Erik Avellaneda and Noah Haile - Usability Testing and Consulting

PC Controls:
Move: WASD
Dodge: IJKL
Attack: Space
Area Attack: E
Ranged Attack (when Soul Bar is sufficiently full): R
Advance Dialogue: F
Pause: Escape

Xbox Controls:
Move: Left Analogue Stick
Dodge: Right Analogue Stick
Attack: X
Area Attack: Y
Ranged Attack (when Soul Bar is sufficiently full): B
Advance Dialogue: A
Pause: Start

PlayStation Controls:
Move: Left Analogue Stick
Dodge: Right Analogue Stick
Attack: Square
Area Attack: Triangle
Ranged Attack (when Soul Bar is sufficiently full): Circle
Advance Dialogue: X
Pause: Start
